thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Mark Romanoff
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Mark Romanoff

author: Mark Romanoff
title: Mark Romanoff
text: I love this Company! Not only are their products fantastic but their customer service sets the example of what it should be. I, originally, was searching on the internet for reading glasses. I had bought them from two other places before finding Banggood and decided to purchase 3 pair from them (what a great selection and prices). Not only did they arrive super fast but they were spot-on perfect and so very comfortable. Also, Banggood's website is so much fun to shop on with so many different, fantastic products with various ways to earn discounts and the prices are unbeatable. Anything I am looking to purchase in the future, Banggood will be the first place I will look!
